name: WebHubAppliancePS

screenshots.caption: PowerShell scripts that build up a WebHub Appliance

short_description:
Initially, this is a collection of powershell scripts that build up a WebHub server starting from a newly booted Windows 2012 Server Essentials ISO (R2). 

A range of commonly required utilities are installed, Windows is customized, and WebHub Runtime is installed (valid credentials required).

Features can be enabled/disabled through 1/0 switches in a single Initialize.ps1 (powershell) script, and certain parameters can be customized.

Use of Drive D: for the main applications and data files is assumed (but can be changed if you edit the ps1 files).
summary: PowerShell script collection to build WebHub appliances
